shortDescription: Zeta Lance moved Captain Magorian out of this area two days ago. They're holding him in a bunker somewhere under the ruins of New Vulci, a city that fell victim to a nuclear accident in 2977. Engage Zeta Lance and destroy their 'Mechs. When you're finished, I'll scour their combat computers for the bunker's coordinates.
longDescription: Let's hope this is the last hoop we need to jump through before finding this guy.
